alfredsnippet.snippet:
from pathlib import Path
p = Path('./dir/hello.tar.gz')
p.is_dir()  # False
p.is_file()  # true

p.name  # "hello.tar.gz"
p.parents[0]  # "./dir"
p.parents[1]  # "."
p.suffix  # ".gz"
p.suffixes  # [".tar", ".tz"]
p.stem  # "hello.tar" # without suffix
p.parts  # [".", "dir", "hello.tar.gz"]

p.with_name("hi.txt")  # "./dir/hi.txt"
p.with_suffix(".xz")  # "./dir/hello.tar.xz"
p.match("*.py")  # false
p.match("*.tar.gz") # true

for i in p.glob("**/*.gz):
    print(i.name)

for i in p.iterdir():
    print(i.name)
    
p.mkdir()
p.chmod()
alfredsnippet.name: os/sys: pathlib
